selectQuery: SELECT * FROM dbcomercial.dbo.tb_item_pedido AS tip WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE tip.Data >= CONVERT(DATE, GETDATE()-20)
deleteQuery: DELETE tip FROM dbcomercial.dbo.tb_item_pedido AS tip WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE tip.Data >= CONVERT(DATE, GETDATE()-20)

selectQuery: SELECT * FROM dbcomercial.dbo.tb_cliente as ta WITH (NOLOCK)
